metadata.name: Rose Queens
metadata.description:
Rose Queens  The first item from the collection of Qajar pixel queens.
Qajar portraits
Court women
 Mesmerizing dancers
 Enchanting musician
Which still shine alive, in the picture frames on the walls of Persian palaces.
But
They updated themselves in this century 
and they have become my attractive pixel art
 so that, still with the passing of centuries they have kept their originality even in contemporary digital art.
In the original painting, this Qajar woman is holding a red flower in her hand, with bright and mesmerizing eyes, exceptional jewelry and a headband unique to the Qajar era. 
This pixel art work has created a new appearance of the Qajar period, which, while being simple, has preserved the authenticity of the original image. 
 As if it has a new life.
